content:
Semi related to rust-analyzer: what's the best way to get a free windows VM in the cloud with VS Code?

I want to debug windows-only bug, and I realized that a nice way to do that might be to VS Code remote into a windows host from my Linux machine, which should save me a tonne of time configuring a windows dev env.
Yeah, I thought the same, but failed to register an account -- neither Russian, nor German card works. Went back to dual boot :)
